instructions.description: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk egg yolks with Parmesan and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving some water. Mix quickly with egg mixture and pancetta.
Adjust consistency with pasta water, serve immediately.
Marinate chicken with yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices for at least 1h.
Grill or pan-fry marinated chicken until browned.
Fry onion with spices, then add tomato puree and simmer.
Add cream and cooked chicken, simmer until thickened.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
